attributes.action: Stop footballers spitting during and after a game of football.
attributes.additional_details: Whist everyone’s Christmas plans have had to be abandoned due to spike in new Covid Variant,  Professional  footballers continue to enjoy the luxury of being paid thousands of pounds. for spitting and hugging each other with disregard to how they are spreading this virus  about.
attributes.background: To pass a law banning the above and from clearing the mucus from their noses
